TITLE: Designer, Frontend & Backend Developer
SUBTITLE: I design and code beautifully simple things, and I love what I do.

PRESENTATION.GREETING: Hi, I’m Hadou Kone. Nice to meet you.
PRESENTATION.INTRO: Since I started my journey as a Fullstack Developer 2 years ago, I have worked remotely for agencies, and collaborated with talented people to create digital products for both businesses and consumers. I am quietly confident, naturally curious and constantly working to improve my skills.

DESIGNER.TITLE: Designer
DESIGNER.DESCRIPTION: I value simple content structure, clean design patterns, and thoughtful interactions.

FRONTEND_DEVELOPER.TITLE: Frontend Developer
FRONTEND_DEVELOPER.DESCRIPTION: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.

BACKEND_DEVELOPER.TITLE: Backend Developer
BACKEND_DEVELOPER.DESCRIPTION: I enjoy building the logic and structure that powers applications. My focus is on creating reliable, scalable, and efficient systems that handle data and ensure seamless communication between the client and server.

WORK.TITLE: My Recent Work
WORK.SUBTITLE: Here are a few past design projects I've worked on. Want to see more?

PROJECT1.DESCRIPTION: Siglass company specializing in glazing and carpentry.

PROJECT2.DESCRIPTION: PGCP, centralized management platform for parishioners in Ivory Coast.

PROJECT3.DESCRIPTION: Maparoisse, back office of all mass request platforms, donations, worship funds, and more.

PROJECT4.DESCRIPTION: Kofasante, mobile application for blood pressure measurement, blood sugar, payment means, appointments, and more.

START_PROJECT.TITLE: Start a project
START_PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: Interested in working together? We should queue up a time to chat. I’ll buy the coffee.

SECOND_SECTION.QUOTE: Living, learning, & leveling up one day at a time.

FORMS.Message: Thanks for taking the time to reach out. How can I help you today?

DATA.messages: Oops! I haven't finished the APIs yet, but you can leave me a message at the following email:
